summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 FORD FOCUS. WHILE DRIVING 40 MPH, THE POWER STEERING COMPLETELY FAILED AND THE POWER STEERING WARNING INDICATOR ILLUMINATED. THE CONTACT PULLED OVER, RESTARTED THE VEHICLE, AND WAS ABLE TO DRIVE HOME. THE CONTACT PREVIOUSLY CALLED J.C. LEWIS FORD (9505 ABERCORN ST, SAVANNAH, GA 31406, (912) 210-5676) BECAUSE THE FAILURE INITIALLY BEAN WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS STARTED. UPON RESTARTING THE VEHICLE, IT RESUMED NORMAL OPERATION. THE DEALER STATED THAT THEY WOULD NOT REPAIR THE VEHICLE BECAUSE THERE WAS NO RECALL. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED AND THEY PROVIDED THE SAME INFORMATION AS THE DEALER. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 90,000.
